contact.text_value: Dear Ms. A, can you confirm your purchase of a plane ticket to Hong Kong?
Dear Mr. B, can you confirm your purchase of a meal in Hong Kong?
Dear Mrs. C, can you confirm your purchase of a plane ticket to New York?

respond.text_value: Mrs. C approved purchase of a plane ticket to New York, purchase number: 9834K-1239Y-8733N.
Mr. B rejected purchase of a meal in Hong Kong, purchase number: 3865T-0665J-5443D.
Ms. A approved purchase of a plane ticket to Hong Kong, purchase number: 2005X-3045B-1569J.
